mapper.insert: insert into store(no, name, category, address, phone, menu, detail, map_lt, map_ln) values(st_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{category},#{address},#{phone},#{menu},#{detail},#{map_lt},#{map_ln})
mapper.update: update store set view_count = view_count + 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select no, name, category, view_count from (select no, name, category,view_count, rownum r from (select * from store order by no desc) order by no desc) where r >= #{start} AND r <= #{end}
select no, name, category, address , phone, map_lt, map_ln, menu, detail, view_count (select count(ltlike) from liketable where ltbid=#{no} and ltlike=1)as blike from store where no=#{no}

select no, name, category, address , phone, map_lt, map_ln, menu, detail, view_count, (select count(ltlike) from liketable where ltbid=no and ltlike=1) as blike from (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by no desc) as RNUM, store.* from store)store where RNUM between #{start} and #{end}
